__TOC__



This week's Hug Day will focus on '''apt'''! 

After you have triaged or fixed a bug put your '''Launchpad Id''' in the last column and set the row's background to green by adding '''lightgreen''' in the first cell of the column after '''rowbgcolor='''.  This will let people know that the bug in that row has been hugged. 

=== Adopt This Package ===

Are you looking for a package to adopt? https://wiki.ubuntu.com/BugSquad/AdoptPackage explains all about it. Apt is one of the available packages and could really use some help with triage. This package has many useful debugging options, but it will take some effort to learn when to use them properly. 

=== Tools ===

For doing your work easier during the hug days remember to use the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuBugDay/Tools|hugday-tools]]</nowiki>.

=== 5-a-day-ing ===

To sign up for 5-A-Day participation, please add your Launchpad ID to the Participants column. (This is not the email address you used for signing up for LP, but the last part of the URL that https://launchpad.net/people/+me redirects you to (everything behind the ~ sign)):

1. Click on https://launchpad.net/people/+me
2. Look at the URL bar, everything behind the ~ sign is your Launchpad ID. 

Also sign up here: https://launchpad.net/~5-a-day-participants/+join

=== Stock Responses ===

For problem specific Stock Responses see: <nowiki>[[Bugs-Responses]]</nowiki>

=== Specific Debugging Tools ===

These responses can be used when responding on incomplete or confirmed bugs:

Useful for download issues:
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="background-color: #eee"> If you can still reproduce the problem, please run the following command: <<BR>> <code> sudo apt-get install rhythmbox -o Debug::Acquire::http=true 2> /tmp/apt-fetch.log </code> <<BR>> and attach the file /tmp/apt-fetch.log to this bugreport. Please edit the file as it may contain the password in plain text.
|}

Packages being added and removed by apt:
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="background-color: #eee"> Could you please run: <<BR>> <code> sudo apt-get dist-upgrade -o Debug::pkgDepCache::AutoInstall=true </code> <<BR>> and attach the output here?
|}
